author: James Van Straten
title: Investment Advisors Become Top Holders of Spot Bitcoin ETFs, Ether ETF Demand Rises
description: 13F filings show investment advisors dominate institutional crypto ETF exposure, with growing interest in ether alongside Bitcoin.
content:
There is a strong institutional presence in U.S. spot crypto exchange-traded funds (ETFs), with investment advisors taking a commanding lead, according to the recent SEC filings.
Investment advisors… [+1042 chars]
